pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lean Analytics and Robust Exploration Sidekick // Auxiliary package for better/faster analytics, visualization, data mining, and machine learning tasks. With a wide variety of family functions, like Machine Learning, Data Wrangling, Marketing Mix Modeling (Robyn), Exploratory, API, and Scrapper, it helps the analyst or data scientist to get quick and robust results, without the need of repetitive coding or advanced R programming skills.
